start: ^You've received alerts that the Apdex score for the pro-api has dropped below 71%.
^No, I’m busy coding. Alerts are too sensitive today, right?
check_customer_impact_question: ^Is there any order loss or poor customer experience?
^Q: How to check if there is order impact?
^No need to check order loss. Logs > Humans. Let me dive into the root cause.
check_customer_impact_answer: ^We can check the impact on orders by checking Shopping Dashboard
^No drop in orders, but customer experience might be suffering. Let’s keep digging.
create_incident: ^No, I’m allergic to post-mortems. No incidents = no write-ups.
create_incident_answer: ^better to log it as it’s a customer-facing endpoint.
^No need. I’ll fix it so fast no one will know! Ninja mode on.
check_newrelic: ^Check NewRelic APM for high response time or increase in error rate to understand drop in Apdex?
^No need ,lets take a rest a bit
check_newrelic_answer: ^it seems the high response time and started 10 minutes ago.
check_new_release_question: ^Is this related to a new release?
^Q: How to check if there is a release correlated?
^No, let’s just wait and hope for the best.
check_new_release_answer: ^We can check if there was a release today correlated by:
^Check NewRelic release markers. Nothing unusual there.
^Checking tlb_production_deployments Slack Channel
rollback_release_question: ^No, let’s just wait and hope for the best.
rollback_release_answer: ^We have differrent options for rollback we can use ArgoCD or trigger DroneCI or revert Git, and redeploy.
^How to Rollback
monitor_apm_answer: ^Wrong decision, let’s keep a watchful eye.
update_monitoring_answer: ^better to update incident to monitoring to update stackholders, let’s keep everyone in the loop.
inform_team_answer: ^Better to inform the team ,let’s share the findings and avoid surprises.
close_incident_answer: ^Finaly time to chill, Apdex is back on track. Crisis mitigated! lets close the incident
post_mortem: ^Create a draft post-mortem with timelines and findings?
post_mortem_answer: ^We have to document everything. Learn from it. Be the hero your team needs.
investigate_canary: ^Pair with the team to check why the canary didn’t detect high response during release?
investigate_canary_answer: ^Better to help the team to avoid such situation later, let’s dig into it.
conclusion: ^🎉 **Victory!** You’ve saved the pro-api and earned the gratitude of all pro customers. The Apdex score is shining again, and your team will be more prepared for the next battle. Take a bow, engineer extraordinaire!
